title: The Emerald Empress: Diamond and Emerald Grand Haaram
materials: Premium Quality Diamonds (approximately 2.56 DWT/212 Units on Locket)
Oval-Cut Emeralds (approximately 3.97 carats/2 stones on necklace
and 3.30 carats/1 stone on the locket) and Rubies (approximately 5.64 carats/2 stones on necklace
and 4.65 carats/1 stone on the locket). Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This magnificent Haaram showcases intricate filigree work embedded with dazzling diamonds, surrounding the center emerald. The contemporary pendant features a bold oval emerald, surrounded by delicate diamond detailing. Classic South Indian design elements are visible in the pendant's floral motifs and the necklace's cascading golden drops (gutta pusalu inspired).
colors: and Deep Red Rubies - a classic South Indian color palette that exudes opulence.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (vivahaalu)
or any event where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for contemporary celebrations where a touch of tradition is desired.
description: This Haaram embodies the perfect blend of traditional Telugu craftsmanship and contemporary design. The high-quality diamonds and vivid emeralds offer exceptional brilliance, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine. A timeless piece that is sure to become a cherished heirloom, representing wealth, prosperity, and timeless elegance.
